name: Me And/Or Her
description:
Warning: depending on choices made, this game contains depictions of suicide and racial slurs. 

In this visual novel, you follow Daniel, a young boy who suffers depression after a series of tragic events. As Daniel's conscience, you must guide him through day to day life in hopes that life will improve, or give up hope an allow Daniel to reunite with those he has lost.

When a new student, Emma, transefers to his school, things seem to be changing. However it is up to you whether Daniel makes an effort to improve his life, or ignores his chance. 

In this game, make choices for both Daniel and Emma to make a story of sweet romance, or a disturbing tragedy.

I will do my best to keep adding to this game with the resources I have.  Your donations will help me pay for an artist for Original chracter designs and CG images.
